repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A multi-text (possibly composite) manuscript, entitled Vayittiyam mūṉṟu ("Three [texts] on medicine"), containing several works on traditional medicine, i.e.:
The Irāmatēvar aruḷiceyta vayittiyam eṇpattoṇṇu ("Eighty-one [verses] on the medicine graciously composed by Irāmatēvar"), which appears to be a medical text. As indicated by the title, its author is Irāmatēvar, i.e. one of the prominent authors of Tamil Siddha medico-alchemical literature. The work consists of 81 enumerated verses (U2).
One leaf with prefatory part of a medical text (U3).
A text entitled on the margin as Vayittiya cāsutiram ariyu[m] paṭiv uṇarttiyatu, which in fact may be a cluster of several various texts, as indiated by the inconsistent numeration of the verses (U4).
An untitled text with medical recipes (U5).

According to the (inadequate) title page, the manuscript contains 3 works:
The Irāmatēvar - 50.
Tēraiyār vayittiyam" ("Medicine of Tēraiyār").
Vayttiyacillaṟai" ("Fragments on medicine").

collation.desc: 30 folios = Irāmatēvar aruḷiceyta vayittiyam eṇpattoṇṇu. Tamil foliation 1-30. Arabic foliation 1-30.
1 folio = TBC. No Tamil foliation. Arabic foliation "30 bis" in pencil on right margin. Possibly introduction to the text.

24 folios = Vayittiya cāsutiram ariyu[m] paṭiv uṇarttiyatu. Text in 46 verses. Tamil foliation 1-24 on the left margin. Arabic foliation 31-54 in pencil on the right margin. This text may acually be a cluster of 3 texts, as the contained verses are enumerated as follows: 2-40 (f31r-41r/1r-11r), 1-10(f41r-43v/11r-13v), 3-46 (f44r-54r/13r-24r).
12 folios = TBC. Tamil foliation 79-91 on the left margin (with no black pigment). Parallel arabic foliation 55-67 in pencil on the right margin.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter-numerals on left margin. Arabic numerals in pencil on right margin.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, in spite of a few broken corners and boreholes caused by insects.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 122 (front cover, recto).
BnF bequest sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).

Left-marginal intertitles with names of the medical preparations: turucucuṇṇam (f4v, lm); Aṅkāy[?] tayilam, vīrameḵku (f5r, lm); Añcaṉapāṣāṇakaṭṭu (f7v, lm); tikkukkaṭ[ṭ]ukku ilēkiyam {pcs} (f9r, lm); pūraṇa lēkiyam (f10r, lm); cempu cutti (f14v, lm); muppu ceyanīr (f16r, lm); Iracamāttirai vākū [vāku] (f17r, lm); vīrameḻuku pātāḷamai (f20r, lm); karuvaṅka meḻuku (f22v, lm); nōyāḷi mai (f23v); Añcaṉa mai (f25v, lm) .

Left-marginal intertitles: kuṭivātam ?eṉpatu ..? kurippum aṭci vātam (f44/14v); Oru talaivali cippiṇicam [tīppīṉicam] rattappiṇicam [rattapīṉicam](f45/15r); pakkapiṇicam [pakkapīṉicam] nētira viyāti ..? ppaṭalam (f45/15v); veṇpaṭalam ? cukkiṟaṇṇai cuk=kiṟaṉ (f46/16r); Uḷḷapaṭalam ..? pīṉicam ...? (f46/16v); piṭari vātam pallukkiṭṭu vātam kaṇṇ vātam Antarappu vātam (f47/17r); talai kuṭiccal vātam eruvu vātam kaiyati vātam (f49/19r); tattu vā??pakka vātam attira vātam (f49/19v); ruttura caṉṉi vātam attira..? cuṟa vātam vallai vātam (f50/20r); vātakuṉmamam[u]m erikuṉmamam[u]m ?ātu cattikuṉmamam[u]m vātam (f51/21v); valiku[ṉ]ma vātam cantu ku ...? vātam (f52/22r); Acati vātam viraivātam kuṭal vātam(f52/22v); Eru viraivātam Uḷamūla vātam piḷa mūla vātam (f53/23r); ṟatta mūla vātam aci mūla vātam āṇi mūla vātam (f53/23v).

Left-marginal intertitles: pittapāṇṭuvuru (f55/79r); pittat=tuk=ku (f55/79v); veṭṭu ppuṇṇuk=ku rētappit=tat=tuk=ku purai kuḻalukku kā[y]ccal ttalaivali (f56/80r); aṇṭavāta tuṟukatali nōy yāṉai yirumpal cokai pitapāṇṭu kamālaikku (f56/80v); kaikāl veṭippukku maṟuvukku kaṇṇov[y]ukku pattu (f57/81r); pēynari pēyṉāy kaṭikku (f57/81v); caṉṉi ?ṇukit? kāl tuṭai ccakala muḻaṅkāl ṉōvukku ...? f58/82r); cakalam kaṇattukku yeṇṇai (f58/82v) pittapāṇṭuvukku (f59/83v); koṭimātaṉaṅkāy koḻumpu [kuḻampu] ~ cuvācakācac celaṣma [cilēṣmam] curam akkiṉimāntam mūk[ku]nīrppā[y]ccal yituk..? (f60/84r); timira vāyvukku kuṅkiliya kuḻampu (f61/85r); kānta centu[ū]ram kānta pāsppam {pcs} (f63/87r) lokacentu[ū]ram (f65/89r); cattu centāram [centūram] (f67/91r).

origin.origDate: No internal date. Dated to 1820 by Vinson (1868) on unstated grounds, not dated by Cabaton (1912).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 23, n0. 122..

Vinson, Julien (1868). Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 33, no. 122. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Updated to TST encoding and edited by Emmanuel FRANCIS.

text.body:
Irāmatēvar aruḷicceyta vayittiyam eṇpattoṇṇu {pcs}
civamaya=M={pcs}
Ātiyilēy amaitta vitiy eḻuttaik kāṇay aruḷāṉa nanti patam aṉpāyk kaṇṭu cōtiy eṉa niṉṟ' ilaṅkum ṉātarūpi curutiyuḷḷa vālai maṉōṉmaṇiyaip pōṟṟi – nītiyuṭaṉ can᷑cāraccamāti ceytu niṉṟaṭāy ātiyantam nilaikkavē tāṉ vātiy eṉa vantōrkku kuruvām innūl vacaṉitteṉ eṇpatu mel oṉṟum ācce = 1 =Preface stanza (n. 1) with dedication and invocation (f1r).

Aṅkāyt tayilam
vīrameḵku
Añcaṉapāṣāṇakaṭṭu
tikkukkaṭṭukku Ilēkiyam {pcs}
pūraṇa-lēkiyam
cempu cutti
muppu ceyanīr
Iracamāttirai vākū [vāku]
vīrameḻuku
pātāḷamai
karuvaṅka meḻuku
nōyāḷi mai
Añcaṉa mai
= 81 = tāṉā
ṉa kaṟpam atu koḷḷum pōtu tayavāka nūl eṭuttu pār
kkum pōtu tēṉāṉa mati amirtam koḷḷum pōtu civa
pūcai kuru pūcai ceyyum pōtu nāṉāṉa vakam pōkki nī tāṉ eṉṟu naṉmaiyuṭaṉ mavuṉamatāy irukka vēṇum kōṉāṉa carkkuruvai ākka vēṇuṅ kuṇamutaiya pūṟaṇattai vaṇaṅka muṟṟē vaṇaṅkam uḷḷa yeṉṉūlai veḷi viṭātē vañcaruṭaṉ pēcātē vātāṭātē yeṇaṅkamillā mātaruṭaṉ iṇaṅkam veṇṭā maṇakka malar mati taṉilē maṉatai vaittu vayitta nūl eṉpatuvu vakaiyāy pārttu taṉakku mitu po
ruḷ eṉavē vaṇaṅki pōṟṟi ~ catākālaṅ kurupatattai cār
vāy muṟṟē =Invocation, text concluding verses, instructions about the use of the book. Irāmatēvar cūs·tiram – 8 10 1 Eḻuti muṟ
ṟum {pcl}
kuruvē tuṇai ~
civa-kuru-v-umai makaṉ ṟiruvaṭikaḷē cāṣṭṭāṅ kama {line-filler: small circle} Aṭimai pattiṉa
Irāmatēvar īnta 8 10 1 y-eḻutiṉavarkaḷukku muṉpākay iruppār {pcl}

body.seg: kuruvē tuṇaiThe vē of kuruvē is in line 5 of left margin 1.

mātumai pākara coṉṉa māmar[ṟ]ai nūlai Āyntu tītukaḷ vāḷat eṉṟu tiruviḷam tutitta pōtu Ātimāmuṉivaṉ coṉṉa Āyuruvētan taṉṉil nātaṉū[l] terint uraitta ṉayaṉamām vitiyat aṉṟē = Ātikālattilē Āyuruvētattiṉ paṭikki yīcuparaṉ upatēcañ coṉṉapaṭi ātimāmuṉivaṉ corppaṭikki tērai
yār Uṇṭu paṇṇiṉa vayittiya nīkaṇṭu paṭikki pūlōkattilē
cakala cīvaṉukkum maṇi mantira Aviḻtam Uṇṭu paṇṇiṉatu y- eṉ
ṟu Aṟiyu=M paṭi Uṇaṟttiyatu {pcl}

vayittiya cās·tiram Ariyu=M paṭi v-uṇarttiyatu {pcs}
vātam eṇpattu
= 4 10 = civamaya=M {pcs}
{pcs} 10 {pcs} rāca kūṭṭam nāṭi vikarppam muṭintutu mus·t=tum {pcs}
civaṉ tuṇaiyāka vēṇu=M carās·pati-y-ammaṉ tuṇaiyāka vēṇu=M {pcs}

pakkapiṇicam [pakkapīṉicam] nētira viyāti ppaṭalam

valikuṉma vātam
cantu kulaitta vātam
Acati vātam viraivātam kuṭal vātam
Eru viraivātam
Uḷamūla vātam
piḷa mūla vātam
ṟatta mūla vātam aci mūla vātam āṇi mūla vātam
